page.title: 10WALTHAM NURSERY, THWAITES
page.content: Waltham Nursery is near the The Green. It has been there for 40 years and is there because the land is good. Mr. Rayson decided to go into business because he is interested in growing fuchsias. He has been growing them for 6 years. He sells fuchsias all over the world.They are packed in boxes and sent by air, sea or post.Some are sold from the nursery as well. There are over 400 different types and about half are grown at the nursery. He displays some of them in hanging baskets. He has won hundreds of prizes including a Rose bowl which has been competed for by people from all over the country. Waltham Nursery has won it twice before for its display of fuchsias.He has just won another award at the Rose Show at Holker Hall.He does not employ anyone at the nursery but all his family help.
